summary:
A VHA employee complained that a co-worker accessed his sensitive record based on a copy of Access Log Report.  10/18/11:
The ticket was reopened and changed to an incident. The complainant made a complaint to HHS OCR and they forwarded the complaint to VA for investigation.
After further investigation it was discovered that the co-worker did impermissibly access the complainants health record. The co-worker had access to the
complainants full name, full SSN, date of birth and other protected health information (PHI).

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
